Its up -- http://archive-access.sourceforge.net/.   I've been plugging 
away at it but I wanted it to have some more substance before I mailed 
the list.

I was going to put hosted projects into the 'projects' folder: 
http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/archive-access/archive-access/.  I 
was going to have the top-level build call into each of the subproject 
builds.

I was going to try and move the arc reading and writing code here, 
breaking it out of the heritrix code base.  Other candidate code would 
be the URI parsing and normalizing code.

Want to move libarc here Tom?

St.Ack


Tom Emerson wrote:

>When are you planning on setting up this project? Or has it already
